text: The Jimmy Carter Library and Museum is the presidential library to honor and remember President of the United States Jimmy Carter. The library was started in 1986. It is in Atlanta, Georgia. Its system is regulated by the National Archives and Records Administration. It is the location of the Carter Center. ==Other websites== * Jimmy Carter Library and Museum Carter Category:Buildings and structures in Atlanta Category:Jimmy Carter Category:1986 establishments in the United States Category:1980s establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Museums in the United States
title: Jimmy Carter Library and Museum
